metadata.title: CVE-2016-8647 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: An input validation vulnerability was found in Ansible's mysql_user module before 2.2.1.0, which may fail to correctly change a password in certain circumstances. Thus the previous password would still be active when it should have been changed.

notes.note: sbeattie> fails on mysql forks percona 5.7 and newer, all mariadb

criterions.comment: ansible package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6.1+dfsg-1').
